parameters.name: taskIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the export task.

nested_items.name: graphId
nested_items.description: The source graph identifier of the export task.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that will allow data to be exported to the destination.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the export task.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the export task.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format of the export task.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 URI of the export task where data will be exported.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The KMS key identifier of the export task.

nested_items.name: parquetType
nested_items.description: The parquet type of the export task.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the export task has this status value.

nested_items.name: exportTaskDetails
nested_items.description: The details of the export task.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the export task.

nested_items.name: timeElapsedSeconds
nested_items.description: The time elapsed, in seconds, since the start time of the export task.

nested_items.name: progressPercentage
nested_items.description: The number of progress percentage of the export task.

nested_items.name: numVerticesWritten
nested_items.description: The number of exported vertices.

nested_items.name: numEdgesWritten
nested_items.description: The number of exported edges.

nested_items.name: exportFilter
nested_items.description: The export filter of the export task.

nested_items.name: vertexFilter
nested_items.description: Used to specify filters on a per-label basis for vertices. This allows you to control which vertex labels and properties are included in the export.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: Each property is defined by a key-value pair, where the key is the desired output property name (e.g. 'name'), and the value is an object.

nested_items.name: outputType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: outputType
nested_items.description: Specifies the data type to use for the property in the exported data (e.g. 'String', 'Int', 'Float'). If a type is not provided, the export process will determine the type. If a given property is present as multiple types (e.g. one vertex has 'height' stored as a double, and another edge has it stored as a string), the type will be of Any type, otherwise, it will be the type of the property as present in vertices.

nested_items.name: sourcePropertyName
nested_items.description: The name of the property as it exists in the original graph data. If not provided, it is assumed that the key matches the desired sourcePropertyName.

nested_items.name: multiValueHandling
nested_items.description: Specifies how to handle properties that have multiple values. Can be either TO_LIST to export all values as a list, or PICK_FIRST to export the first value encountered. If not specified, the default value is PICK_FIRST.

nested_items.name: edgeFilter
nested_items.description: Used to specify filters on a per-label basis for edges. This allows you to control which edge labels and properties are included in the export.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: Each property is defined by a key-value pair, where the key is the desired output property name (e.g. 'name'), and the value is an object.

nested_items.name: outputType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: outputType
nested_items.description: Specifies the data type to use for the property in the exported data (e.g. 'String', 'Int', 'Float'). If a type is not provided, the export process will determine the type. If a given property is present as multiple types (e.g. one vertex has 'height' stored as a double, and another edge has it stored as a string), the type will be of Any type, otherwise, it will be the type of the property as present in vertices.

nested_items.name: sourcePropertyName
nested_items.description: The name of the property as it exists in the original graph data. If not provided, it is assumed that the key matches the desired sourcePropertyName.

nested_items.name: multiValueHandling
nested_items.description: Specifies how to handle properties that have multiple values. Can be either TO_LIST to export all values as a list, or PICK_FIRST to export the first value encountered. If not specified, the default value is PICK_FIRST.
